name: Paloma
intro: Cosmos-SDK blockchain that moves messages between any other blockchains
introduce: Paloma is a fast, permissionless, Cosmos-SDK blockchain that moves messages securely, between any other blockchains. Paloma is designed for developers who wish to manage bi-directional messages between chains in a scalable and secure manner. Volume provides blockchain messaging software that is secure, scalable allowing developers to communicate across any number of blockchains and at the lowest possible cost.
